summary:
The Security Council,
Recalling resolutions 1267 (1999) and 1333 (2000),
Noting Ariana Afghan Airlines is no longer affiliated with the Taliban,
Acting under Chapter VII of the UN Charter,
Decides that provisions of paragraph 4 (a) and (b) of resolution 1267 (1999) do not apply to Ariana Afghan Airlines aircraft or funds; 
Decides to terminate the measure provided for by paragraph 8 (b) of resolution 1333 (2000);
Decides to remain seized of the matter.
